header.label: UART Light
header.name: uart_light
header.description: The UART Light is a SpartanMC peripheral device for serial communication with external systems. Compared to the standard UART the UART Light uses a lightwight interface which enables a smaller resource footprint. To provide the minimum interface the peripheral is primarily configured via pre synthesis parameters.

register.name: STATUS
register.description: Contains the current Rx/Tx FIFO status. For resetting the tx interrupt this register should be read.

bitgroup.name: RX_EMPTY
bitgroup.description: Set to one if the Rx FIFO is empty otherwise the value is zero.

bitgroup.name: RX_FULL
bitgroup.description: Set to one if the Rx FIFO is full otherwise the value is zero.

bitgroup.name: TX_EMPTY
bitgroup.description: Set to one if the Tx FIFO is empty otherwise the value is zero.

bitgroup.name: TX_FULL
bitgroup.description: Set to one if the Tx FIFO is full otherwise the value is zero.

bitgroup.name: RX_IE
bitgroup.description: To enable rx interrupt set this bit should be set to otherwise set to zero. This bit is only in not polling mode available.

bitgroup.name: TX_IE
bitgroup.description: To enable tx interrupt this bit should be set to one otherwise set to zero. This bit is only in not polling mode available.

register.name: RX_DATA
register.description: Register for incoming data. The LSB of the data word is written to UART_FIFO_READ0. For resetting the rx interrupt this register should be read.

register.name: TX_DATA
register.description: Register for outgoing data. The LSB of the data word is written UART_FIFO_WRITE0.
